    • 方法详细资料

      • onMeasure

        public void onMeasure(int widthMeasureSpec,
                      int heightMeasureSpec)
        从类复制的说明: FView

        Measure the view and its content to determine the measured width and the measured height. This method is invoked by FView.measure(int, int) and should be overridden by subclasses to provide accurate and efficient measurement of their contents.

        CONTRACT: When overriding this method, you must call FView.setMeasuredDimension(int, int) to store the measured width and height of this view. Failure to do so will trigger an IllegalStateException, thrown by FView.measure(int, int). Calling the superclass' FView.onMeasure(int, int) is a valid use.

        The base class implementation of measure defaults to the background size, unless a larger size is allowed by the MeasureSpec. Subclasses should override FView.onMeasure(int, int) to provide better measurements of their content.

        If this method is overridden, it is the subclass's responsibility to make sure the measured height and width are at least the view's minimum height and width (FView.getSuggestedMinimumHeight() and FView.getSuggestedMinimumWidth()).

        覆盖:
        onMeasure 在类中 FView
        参数:
        widthMeasureSpec - horizontal space requirements as imposed by the parent. The requirements are encoded with FMeasureSpec.
        heightMeasureSpec - vertical space requirements as imposed by the parent. The requirements are encoded with FMeasureSpec.
        另请参阅:
        FView.getMeasuredWidth(), FView.getMeasuredHeight(), FView.setMeasuredDimension(int, int), FView.getSuggestedMinimumHeight(), FView.getSuggestedMinimumWidth(), FMeasureSpec.getMode(int), FMeasureSpec.getSize(int)

      • onLayout

        public void onLayout(boolean changed,
                     int l,
                     int t,
                     int r,
                     int b)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Called from layout when this view should assign a size and position to each of its children. Derived classes with children should override this method and call layout on each of their children.
        指定者:
        onLayout 在接口中 IFView
        指定者:
        onLayout 在类中 FViewGroup
        参数:
        changed - This is a new size or position for this view
        l - Left position, relative to parent
        t - Top position, relative to parent
        r - Right position, relative to parent
        b - Bottom position, relative to parent

      • generateDefaultLayoutParams

        public FFrameLayout.LayoutParams generateDefaultLayoutParams()
        从接口复制的说明: IFViewGroup
        Returns a set of default layout parameters. These parameters are requested when the View passed to IFViewGroup.addView(FView) has no layout parameters already set. If null is returned, an exception is thrown from addView.
        指定者:
        generateDefaultLayoutParams 在接口中 IFViewGroup
        覆盖:
        generateDefaultLayoutParams 在类中 FViewGroup
        返回:
        a set of default layout parameters or null

      • checkLayoutParams

        protected boolean checkLayoutParams(IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams p)
        覆盖:
        checkLayoutParams 在类中 FViewGroup

      • generateLayoutParams

        protected IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams generateLayoutParams(IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams lp)
        从类复制的说明: FViewGroup
        Returns a safe set of layout parameters based on the supplied layout params. When a ViewGroup is passed a View whose layout params do not pass the test of #checkLayoutParams(FLayoutParams), this method is invoked. This method should return a new set of layout params suitable for this ViewGroup, possibly by copying the appropriate attributes from the specified set of layout params.
        覆盖:
        generateLayoutParams 在类中 FViewGroup
        参数:
        lp - The layout parameters to convert into a suitable set of layout parameters for this ViewGroup.
        返回:
        an instance of FLayoutParams or one of its descendants
